Name: Morning Sun
Effect: Self. Basic Heal. If successful, spend 1 Will point to activate. If Sunny Weather is in effect, this Move becomes a Complete Heal. If performed at Night, under Rain, Sandstorm or Hail Weather, this Move only heals 1 HP.
Description: The sun shines brightly on the Pok√©mon and makes it feel rejuvenated like it's early in the morning.
